name: The Ultimate Math Quest
description:
This is a small game that was made for a school project. A while ago, a user by the name of Blackwinged Wolf had reached out for developers to help him in his development. I happily decided to help. the end result is this game! its a game about a white fox battling shadow creatures... with math! this game isnt exactly ground breaking, but i hope you enjoy it. Your health is indicated in the top left of the screen, and when you touch an enemy you have to answer a math question. answer wrong and you loose a hit-point, answer correctly and nothing happens. there are health items dotted about the stage that will make you gain a hit-point when touched. 

and there might be a little surprise if  you dont loose any health and get every health up.
